No alternative text found for these imag: No alternative text was found for these images. Alt tags are important for both SEO and accessibility. Edit your images using the media library or your favorite page builder and fill in alternative text fields.

To avoid any SEO issues, we recommend yo: To avoid any SEO issues, we recommend you to activate the "Disable trailing slash for metas" option from our Advanced settings page. Do not forget to clear your cache if necessary.
To avoid any SEO issues, we recommend you to de-activate the "Disable trailing slash for metas" option from our Advanced settings page. Do not forget to clear your cache if necessary.

This error indicates that your theme use: This error indicates that your theme uses a deprecated function to generate the title tag of your pages. SEOPress will not be able to generate your custom title tags if this error is not fixed.

Https is considered by Google as a posit: Https is considered by Google as a positive signal for the ranking of your site. It also reassures your visitors for data security, and improves trust.
PHP module \"DOM\" is missing on your se: PHP module "DOM" is missing on your server.
This PHP module, installed by default wi: This PHP module, installed by default with PHP, is required by many plugins, including SEOPress. Please contact your host as soon as possible to solve this.
Your site is not visible to Search Engin: Your site is not visible to Search Engines!
You have activated the blocking of the i: You have activated the blocking of the indexing of your site. If your site is under development, this is probably normal. Otherwise, check your settings. Delete this notification using the cross on the right if you are not concerned.
Your Site Title is used by WordPress, yo: Your Site Title is used by WordPress, your theme, and your plugins, including SEOPress. It is an essential component in the generation of title tags, but not only. Enter one!
Your permalinks are not SEO Friendly! En: Your permalinks are not SEO Friendly! Enable pretty permalinks to fix this.
Why is this important? Showing only the: Why is this important? Showing the summary of each article significantly reduces the theft of your content by third party sites. Not to mention, the increase in your traffic, your advertising revenue, conversions...

Support the development and improvement: Support the development and improvement of the plugin by taking 15 seconds of your time to leave us a user review on the official WordPress plugins repository. Thank you!
Break comments into pages is ON!: Break comments into pages is ON!
Enabling this option will create duplica: Enabling this option will create duplicate content for each article beyond x comments. This can have a disastrous effect by creating a large number of poor quality pages and slowing the Google bot unnecessarily, so hindering your ranking in search results.
Display more posts per page on homepage: Display more posts per page on homepage and archives
To reduce the number pages search engine: To reduce the number pages search engines have to crawl to find all your articles, it is recommended displaying more posts per page. This should not be a problem for your users. Using mobile, we prefer to scroll down rather than clicking on next page links.

XML Sitemaps are useful to facilitate th: XML Sitemaps are useful to facilitate the crawling of your content by search engine robots. Indirectly, this can benefit your ranking by reducing the crawl bugdet.

Enable remarketing, demographics, and in: Enable remarketing, demographics, and interests reporting
A remarketing audience is a list of cook: A remarketing audience is a list of cookies or mobile-advertising IDs that represents a group of users you want to re-engage because of their likelihood to convert.
When a customer of Analytics requests IP: When a customer of Analytics requests IP address anonymization, Analytics anonymizes the address as soon as technically feasible at the earliest possible stage of the collection network.
Enhanced Link Attribution improves the a: Enhanced Link Attribution improves the accuracy of your In-Page Analytics report by automatically differentiating between multiple links to the same URL on a single page by using link element IDs.
Cross domain tracking makes it possible: Cross domain tracking makes it possible for Analytics to see sessions on two related sites (such as an ecommerce site and a separate shopping cart site) as a single session. This is sometimes called site linking.
Separate each file type extensions with: Separate each file type extensions with a pipe "|"

If one visitor visits x.example.com and: If one visitor visits x.example.com and y.example.com, they will be counted as a unique visitor.

If someone visits the 'About' page on bl: If someone visits the 'About' page on blog.example.com it will be recorded as 'blog / About'. This is the easiest way to get an overview of your traffic by sub-domain.
Tracking requests will not be sent if vi: Tracking requests will not be sent if visitors do not wish to be tracked.

Writing content for your users is the mo: Writing content for your users is the most important thing! If it doesn‘t feel natural, your visitors will leave your site, Google will know it and your ranking will be affected.
Separate target keywords with commas. Do: Separate target keywords with commas. Do not use spaces after the commas, unless you want to include them
To get the most accurate analysis, save: To get the most accurate analysis, save your post first. We analyze all of your source code as a search engine would.
Enter a keyword, or a phrase, to find th: Enter a keyword, or a phrase, to find the top 10 Google suggestions instantly. This is useful if you want to work with the long tail technique.
Titles are critical to give users a quic: Titles are critical to give users a quick insight into the content of a result and why it’s relevant to their query. It's often the primary piece of information used to decide which result to click on, so it's important to use high-quality titles on your web pages.
A meta description tag should generally:
A meta description tag should generally inform and interest users with a short, relevant summary of what a particular page is about.
They are like a pitch that convince the user that the page is exactly what they're looking for.
There's no limit on how long a meta description can be, but the search result snippets are truncated as needed, typically to fit the device width.
The Google preview is a simulation. <br>:
The Google preview is a simulation.
There is no reliable preview because it depends on the screen resolution, the device used, the expression sought, and Google.
There is not one snippet for one URL but several.
All the data in this overview comes directly from your source code.
This is what the crawlers will see.

2048 characters max.; default: meta desc: 2048 characters max.; default: meta description. If not available, use the beginning of the post content.
Minimum size: 160x90px (1920x1080 max),: Minimum size: 160x90px (1920x1080 max), JPG, PNG or GIF formats. Default: your post featured image.
The duration of the video in seconds. Va: The duration of the video in seconds. Value must be between 0 and 28800 (8 hours).
Allowed values are float numbers in the: Allowed values are float numbers in the range 0.0 to 5.0.
32 tags max., separate tags with commas. Default: target keywords + post tags if available.
256 characters max., usually a video wil: 256 characters max., usually a video will belong to a single category, separate categories with commas. Default: first post category if available.
The video will be available only to user: The video will be available only to users with SafeSearch turned off.

The following wizard will help you confi: The following wizard will help you configure SEOPress and get you started quickly.

No data to migrate? Click \"Next step\": No data to migrate? Click "Next step" button!
To build title tags and knowledge graph: To build title tags and knowledge graph for Google, you need to fill out the fields below to configure the general settings.
This separator will be used by the dynam: This separator will be used by the dynamic variable %%sep%% in your title and meta description templates.
Specify to the search engines what you w: Specify to the search engines what you want to be indexed or not.
Avoid indexing duplicate or poor quality: Avoid indexing duplicate or poor quality content.
For which single post types, should inde: For which single post types, should indexing be disabled?
Do not display this single post type in: Do not display this single post type in search engine results (noindex)
For which post type archives, should ind: For which post type archives, should indexing be disabled?
Do not display this post type archive in: Do not display this post type archive in search engine results (noindex)
For which taxonomy archives, should inde: For which taxonomy archives, should indexing be disabled?
Do not display this taxonomy archive in: Do not display this taxonomy archive in search engine results (noindex)
You only have one author on your site? C: You only have one author on your site? Check this option to avoid duplicate content.
By default, SEOPress redirects your Atta: By default, SEOPress redirects your Attachment pages to the parent post. Optimize this by redirecting the user directly to the URL of the media file.

When you upgrade to the PRO version, you: When you upgrade to the PRO version, you get a lot of additional features, like automatic and manual schemas, Video Sitemap, WooCommerce enhancements, Analytics statistics in your Dashboard, breadcrumbs, redirections, and more.

URL rewriting is NOT enabled on your sit: URL rewriting is NOT enabled on your site. Select a permalink structure that is optimized for SEO (NOT Plain).
